channel.title: Synaptic
channel.description: Patrick what's your opinion on including synaptic out of the box? I remember it used to be on there before. It would make things easier.

item.title: Synaptic
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Was included in past. Removed because it causes more issues than it solves.
Search https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Automatic_Updates for https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Dev/Automatic_Updates for synaptic.
